pages.text: The $(bold)Void Drill$() is a tool of simple destruction. When used, it will destroy any blocks you look at instantly (except for invincible ones, like bedrock, barriers, or moving pistons) - without dropping anything. Much better than lugging around 999 stacks of cobblestone.

The drill has several modes, which can be switched between by sneak-right-clicking. By default, one block will be broken at a time; this can be increased to a 3x3 square or a 3x3x3 cube. Note that the cube is centred on the block behind the one you look at. (The drill will not break anything while sneaking.)
